an7.27:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you seven principles of non-decline. Listen and attend closely. I will speak."
an7.27:2: () As long as they develop the perception of non-self … (3) … the perception of unattractiveness … (4) … the perception of danger … (5) … the perception of abandoning … (6) … the perception of dispassion … (7) … the perception of cessation, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline.[n.1480] All these perceptions are explained atAN10.60, with three additions.
an7.27:3: "Bhikkhus, as long as these seven principles of non-decline continue among the bhikkhus, and the bhikkhus are seenestablishedin them, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline."
